summary: This document is a correspondence from the School District of Palm Beach County, Florida, regarding the release of student records in response to a subpoena or records request. It includes contact information for further assistance and mentions a protective order.

persons.name: Dawn Pumphrey
persons.context: Dawn Pumphrey is identified as the Director in the correspondence regarding the release of student records.

persons.name: Deepak Agarwal
persons.context: Deepak Agarwal is mentioned as the Chief Information Officer in the correspondence related to the release of student records.

persons.name: Dominique Hyppolite
persons.context: Dominique Hyppolite is referenced as the contact person for further assistance regarding the student records request.

locations: 3300 Forest Hill Boulevard, Suite B-241, West Palm Beach, FL 33406
keyFacts: The document is a response to a subpoena or records request for student records.
It includes a protective order referenced in the subject line.
Contact information for further assistance is provided.
